item.description:
Need to see some RED?

The 8th Annual Cranberry Harvest Celebration - hosted by the A.D. Makepeace Company and the Cape Cod Cranberry Growers' Association is on for Saturday, October 8 from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.

As stated on its website (www.cranberryharvest.org):  "The highlight of the day is an opportunity to witness a working cranberry bog."  How excellent is that!!

The NH contingent leave the parking lot across from the Ioka Theater in Exeter at 8:30 on Saturday - it's a 2 hour drive so we should get there around 10:30. If you're near the border, consider heading to Exeter to carpool.

We can spend the day at the celebration ... we might also find other places to photograph around the area after the celebration so more to come.
item.name: 8th Annual Cranberry Harvest Celebration
